title: Topic 004 Question 038
body: You have an Azure AD tenant that contains two users named User1 and User2.
You plan to perform the following actions:
•	Add User1 and User2 to Group1.
•	Assign Azure AD roles to Group1.
Which two settings can you use? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options:
Group type: Security -
Membership type: Dynamic User

Group type: Microsoft 365 -
Membership type: Dynamic User

Group type: Security -
Membership type: Dynamic Device
